biotools.summary:
Interactive Database-Driven Analysis of Single Cell RNA Sequencing Data.


UNCURL-App is a unified framework for interactively analyzing single-cell RNA-seq data. It is based on UNCURL for data preprocessing and clustering. It can be used to perform a variety of tasks such as:.

This exposes the given port, and then the uncurl-app website can be visited in the browser at http://your-ip-address:port. To stop the server, run sudo killall gunicorn in another terminal.
